title: Today’s lunch
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hmm? Your lunch today is a nori roll sushi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yes. It’s an Ehomaki that I didn’t get to eat yesterday~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I see. But, did you buy so much that you couldn’t eat them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Uu, that’s because… there’s a lot of variants of Ehomaki right now you see?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Once you saw them, you wanted them and bought all variants....something like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehehe~. After all it’s a lot of delicious things wrapped up with delicious rice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, all the delicious things are tightly hugging huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! Go ahead and take a piece, Kanan-san! It’s delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
